Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> After KMD block 1 Million, the amount of time before the rewards stop accruing is 1 month. But the annual reward becomes 5.1% instead of the previous 5%.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> so you have a 1 month time period to be on track with 5.1 % per year

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> as long as you fulfill this you should be around that percentage

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> if you pass a month and you remembered after two weeks past the month date when you needed to claim the rewards the only thing is that you won‚Äôt claim the full 5.1% annually but maybe let's say 4.78 % annually so it just depends on the users how much they are engaged with the wallet but as long as you claim monthly it will all be good
